original_text: And the sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman: of Ard, the clan of the Ardites; of Naaman, the clan of the Naamites.
korean_text: 벨라의 아들들은 아릇과 나아만이라 아릇에게서 아릇 종족과 나아만에게서 나아만 종족이 났으니

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman
of Ard, the clan of the Ardites
of Naaman, the clan of the Naamites.
